post.text: If you're voting for Hillary, don't stop there. We need to support Democrats down the ticket to make her vision for America a reality.

comment.author: Brandon
comment.text: Hillary I voted for you I'm upset about the recent allegations hoping things work out I cant stand trump and have an awful feeling he might win

replies.author: Daniel
replies.text: You People Got in a Jerk ! Hey Go Vote again FOR TRUMP (y)

replies.author: Julia
replies.text: I wouldn't worry about it yet, there's no clear indication where these new emails came from or if they were even from/to her and on her server!

replies.author: Samuel
replies.text: Unless your an illegal immigrant or terrorists, you have nothing to worry about. It's gonna be OK.

replies.author: Arik
replies.text: He is our only hope to stop the corruption in Washington.
